name: Narriseminek
content:
Narriseminek

The Crownless, the Maker of Kings

Source Concordance of Rivals pg. 14
Pathfinder Wiki Narriseminek

Details

Alignment CN
Pantheon Protean Lord
Areas of Concern Ascendance, keketars, and revelations
Domains Chaos, Knowledge, Liberation, Madness
Subdomains N/A
* Requires the Acolyte of Apocrypha trait.
Favored Weapon Handaxe
Symbol Imentesh head wreathed in a circle of flame

Obedience

Surround yourself in a burning circle of flames at least 5 feet out from where you stand, chanting prayers until the flames burn down to coals or smoke from any source harms you. Gain a +4 sacred bonus on saves against fire-based spells and attacks.

Boons - Monitor Obedience

None

Source Concordance of Rivals pg. 14
1: Ascended (Sp) anticipate peril 3/day, detect thoughts 2/day, or heroism 1/day
2: Crownless Crown (Ex) You gain a halo of illusory protean symbols around your head. Once per day, you can call upon it to invoke a keketar's reshape reality ability, except it functions as a 7th-level spell rather than a 9th-level spell.
3: Mantle of Revelation (Sp) You can cast foresight once per day.
